chapters.title: Chapter 31: The Woman of Tanchico
chapters.info: Thomdril (Thom) Merrilin, p. 352 (281)—Former court bard in the Royal Court of Andor, now a gleeman. He came to Emond's Field on Winternight, and left with Rand, Mat, Perrin, Egwene, Lan, and Moiraine on their journey. He saved Rand's life by facing a Myrddraal long enough for Rand to escape, and managed to escape. He is an expert at Daes Daemar, the Game of Houses; he could and does play it in his sleep. See also Dena; Trakand, Morgase.
